留言內容: The blouse is awesome! The size was perfect, I ordered XL, it’s perfect in all aspects. Love the fabric, it’s light, soft and not see through. The colors are just as you see it in the photo. I recommend it. I’m buying this brand again.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領上衣抽繩短袖 T 恤襯衫

留言內容: Comfortable fit, but the first time I washed it it frayed at the seams under the arms. I had to return it. I washed it on delicate cycle in a new bag, and line dried.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領上衣抽繩短袖 T 恤襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: Blue
留言內容: Beautiful different colors throughout the whole blouse. The flowers are a mix of reds ,corals, white & more like a light violet colors too. With a mix of black colors too. Looks great with jeans, & even purchase some red slip on shoes to go with it too.Anyway, the only issue I found, the blouse was way too long.  Which one can tuck it in, if find it's too long.I'm 5'2 & don't tuck my blouse in, so I fixed the way too long issues by alterations. I cut the bottom of it straight line, & tucked it under 2 inches, & sewed in elastic.  Which now, now I absolutely love this blouse , & will probably purchase a few more of different colors, & do the same alternations to it too.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領上衣抽繩短袖 T 恤襯衫

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領上衣抽繩短袖 T 恤襯衫
留言內容: This is one of several shirts I ordered as part of my current church wardrobe switch up.  Which seems never ending at this point, but...back to this shirt, which came today.  So there are a few things that I want to pass on to you as you're making a decision about whether or not you want to buy it.First up, it shipped from China, I ordered it July 22nd, today is Aug. 3...so be prepared that it could totally take a while to get here.Next up, I actually really, really like it.  Some of the shirts I got I was kind of tepid on, but there wasn't anything wrong enough with them to return, and they were cheap enough I'm just donating them.  But this one, I am keeping, though there are a couple of things I want to draw your attention to, and I will let you know which ones I took the star off for.First up, I want to apologize if these appear sideways in the final review posting.  They orient correctly on my phone and on my computer, but they're posting sideways no matter what I do as I'm working on this review, so I'm submitting it this way, and unfortunately, if it posts the way it's viewing on my end right now, you're just going to have to turn your head sideways because I don't have any more time to spend trying to figure out why it's going wonky.  Sorry about that!  visually, it's much prettier in person then it is in the picture, and it is not apparent from that it is a light blue mingled in with the white and red on the pattern, which visually makes it actually much more interesting in my opinion.  It fits similar in appearance on me to the sizing shown on the model relatively speaking, but the back part does flair out a little bit more.  Which makes my butt look even bigger, not that it needs the help ;) But it's one of the few areas I wish my muscles were better responders, so...I suppose it's not a bad thing ;)The button is cute, and the distinctive look is great...until you loose one, it's going to be hard to replace, you'll end up needing to replace both, and this doesn't come with a spare.  But that's not why I'm marking this down.  Also, just be aware the inside of this fabric is white, so the pattern is dyed on the outside, and some little flecks of white from this can show through on the stitching, but it isn't as noticeable except areas where the seams pull when you move with this shirt because there is already white in the pattern, so it kind of blends.The reason I'm taking the star off is that when it comes to the seams, the tension is off in some spots, but not over the entire length of the stitching, and I've marked an example of that up on a picture. You can see it where the stitches ripple up from the fabric. There is backstitching (that is what it is called when they stitch over the end of a sewn line with a machine to keep it from coming undone), but it's not as securely done as I would like.  So, this blouse most likely isn't going to develop problems right away, but I expect based on what I am seeing that I will need to repair a seam or two sooner then I can give a 5 star rating to.  No matter how much I like the shirt.  And visually, I really like this one a whole bunch.The fabric is 95% polyester, 5% spandex, and the tag says machine wash is fine, but it can not be put in the dyer or ironed.  The fabric does feel pleasantly soft, and there's no tag at the back of the neck, which I love, because they always drive me a little crazy.  So overall, this is a very appealing shirt that actually could be dressed up or down depending on what you paired it with.  Just has some quality control issues with the seams.

留言內容: This blouse will work as a work option. Notably: I received a prompt that suggested I order a large instead of an X-Large. I ordered the X-L anyway. I'm glad I did. My size is deceiving because I am some what petite, but require close to a 16 across the bust area while my pant size is half of that. The sleeve length fit just above my wrists. I loved the color in the picture, it looked more red, white and blue to me... It's pretty, but the flowers are more purple than blue. I was also hoping it had more of a cotton blend or silk feel, it is definitely more polyester in feel/look. For the price, it will work in air conditioned atmospheres. It was received on time/fast undamaged. Overall, it was a positive experience.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領上衣抽繩短袖 T 恤襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: Blue
留言內容: Purchased this shirt for business casual work office.  The colors are stunning and it is really a cute shirt.  It has NO stretch in it though.  I ordered an XL which normally fits great, even baggy, but this one is pretty tight in the chest.  You should definitely size up if you can.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領上衣抽繩短袖 T 恤襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: C Red
留言內容: Purchased the ted pattern. Sleeves have a lot of pleating at the shoulder line. Not flattering if you have broad shoulders. Returning this item.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領上衣抽繩短袖 T 恤襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: D Pink
留言內容: I was on the fence about this shirt for a long time but finally decided to go for it and I'm glad I did. This blouse is prettier in person than in the online pictures. It is a light material that hangs/drapes well without being see-through (I wore a turquoise bra underneath while trying it on, and it didn't show through.) and the sleeves are beautiful.  I often find that when I order shirts with ruffled or puffy sleeves, the pictures look better than the actual product that arrives but that wasn't the case here. They sleeves are the perfect amount of puffiness and the large ruffled cuffs add a little extra to the romantic feel of the shirt. One final thing I wanted to mention is that this shirt does have buttons in the front. I actually hadn't noticed them in the pictures so I was a bit surprised when the shirt arrived and I saw buttons. They are pretty though, and subtle; small buttons covered with the same fabric that the shirt is made from. The buttons add an element of polishedness and keep the shirt from slipping into frumpy/pajama-like territory. You could layer it over a camisole either buttoned or unbottoned if you wanted to change the effect and I imagine both would lool cute.  So anyway, I reccomend this shirt. I am very happy with it, For size reference I am 5'4 and a little bigger through the chest but average sized in the arms, waist and shoulders. I bought a L and it fit perfectly.
